reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits perfectly, with one noting it hits mid-calf, and appreciate its beautiful style, particularly the navy color. The dress is well-made with pockets, has a nice heavy fabric that's thick enough for fall, and is comfortable to wear. They like its appropriate sizing and consider it good value for money. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars An awesome dress!
items.body: This is a beautiful dress. The only complaint I have is that due to the packaging, there were so many wrinkles that remained for weeks. I had to actually iron it prior to wearing. Other than that complaint, the fit was perfect. I am 130lbs and 5’2”, so I ordered a medium (8-10), and it could not have fit better. I wore this to my grandson’s wedding and received many compliments. I would definitely recommend this dress for dressy events, as well as for a night out. The pricing was very reasonable. Read more
items.author: Graneez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress option!
items.body: Such a fun and very comfortable dress! It’s true to size, light weight yet heavy enough for fall. So so soft and great style and dress ability where you can dress it up or down. Read more
items.author: Addi Huss

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Zesica long sleeve midi dress
items.body: Dress as shown. Great fit just a little long due to my height of only 5’3. Material is slightly thick. Great for any season. I’m 5’3 current weight 159 lbs. got this in a Large. Got a lot of compliments. Read more
items.author: Gorgeous1

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Material not as lovely in person
items.body: The dress fits true to size. I’m a comfortable medium and the medium fit beautifully. The color was exactly as pictured and it had a beautiful cut to it, i.e. it looks as pretty as the picture shows it. However, the quality of the material is not great in person. Yes, the material is heavy but the way it looks and feels— there’s no richness to it. I tend to be very picky with materials - so it may not bother you, but I couldn’t look past that and I returned it. Read more
items.author: MamaLama

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars not what i was expecting
items.body: this dress is short barely cover the knee, could be better quality Read more
items.author: Diane

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars SO cute for a black tie moment
items.body: I had low expectations after ordering 10 dresses on amazon days before an expensive black tie wedding and was THRILLED to find this dress was 1) high quality 2) thick 3) durable yet somehow 4) so dainty and feminine. It hasn't wrinkled, stained, no odor and the color is effortlessly black. Gorgeous dress and would highly recommend to anyone nervous about what to wear for a big event. Read more
items.author: Laura Elizabeth

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Nice Dress
items.body: The length is great. It's a little loose up top but nothing to be alamed about. The material is nice and heavy. Overall a good buy. Read more
items.author: Joaquin S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning!
items.body: My daughter needed a modest dress to wear to to a chassadic jew-ish winter wedding. The dress fit her as if it were tailored made just for her. The length was perfect for the venue. The fabric was thick enough to keep her warm - as the tradition is to have the Chuppah ceremony outdoors (no matter the weather). She found a stylish dressy belt that she wore with this paired with a pair of pumps. She looked absolutely stunning. The dress looked more expensive than its actual price. Read more
items.author: K.M.B.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Brown, Navy, Pink, White, Blue, Apricot, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
